attributes.action: Step in and save jobs at the Vestas Blades UK plant
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We Call on Mr Brown and his Government to do something for the people, These Jobs can't be lost in the isle of wight, nor can the UK lose it's only manufacturing plant that makes these blades. There is huge support to save this plant, we have dont our bit..... it's time you did yours!!!!
